title: iSTappaDikkinda Ezhaiyai
sahitya:
iSTappaDikkinda Ezhaiyai naDattuvAi emperumAnE sharaNam


anupallavi

  aSTa mUrtiyE harihara shiva nAraNA allAh parama pitA ellAm valla poruLE


caraNam    eTTum iraNDum aindum innaden-r-arigilEn ETTait-tuLakkum pUcci pATTai suvaikkumO
kuTTik-kuTTiyEnum maTTittanattai nIkki kuraiyara sirayara karai sEr en duraiyE un
